name: Order Road
description:
Order Road is a kinematic visual novel with optional mini-games.
Nikolay Porridge prepares for Computer Science exam. Only his friends can save him. Watch him as he experience unspeakable ordeals of education and gets distracted by action games.

Features
  • Kinematic visual novel
  • Multiple action game modes and cross-linked stories to the plot
  • Animated 3D characters
  • Over 25 optional action stages in mini-games which distract from reading the novel
  • Animated physical text that reacts to cursor movement
  • Dark Russian underground atmosphere
  • Crude humor
  • Cringe
